title: Tron [short version]
creator_credit: Steven Lisberger, Donald Kushner and Walt Disney Animation Studios
brief_description: This is an adapted version of the feature-length film of the same name. It is a story about a whizkid computer programmer trapped inside a computer world where he is pitted against electronic foes. Featuring some very impressive computer-generated animation. Cast includes Jeff Bridges, David Warner and Bruce Boxleitner. Nominated for Best Costume and Best Sound in the 1982 Academy Awards.
